mapper.select: SELECT t3.*, t1.name, t2.task_name FROM pms_member t1, project_task t2, project_log t3 WHERE t1.pno = t2.pno AND t1.pno = t3.pno AND t2.project_no = #{no} ORDER BY regdte

SELECT t1.task_no, t1.task_name, t2.name, t1.enddte, t1.task_priority, t3.PROJECT_NAME FROM pms_member t2, project_task t1, PMS_PROJECT t3 WHERE t1.pno = t2.pno and t1.task_parent_no = 1 AND t1.TASK_STATUS NOT IN ('완료') AND t1.PROJECT_NO = t3.PROJECT_NO AND t1.project_no = #{no} order by t1.task_no desc

SELECT t1.task_no, t1.task_name, t2.name, t1.enddte, t1.task_priority FROM pms_member t2, project_task t1 WHERE t1.pno = t2.pno and t1.task_parent_no = 1 AND t1.TASK_STATUS NOT IN ('완료') AND t1.project_no = #{no} order by t1.enddte

SELECT t1.task_no, t1.task_name, t2.name, t1.enddte, t1.task_priority FROM pms_member t2, project_task t1 WHERE t1.pno = t2.pno and t1.task_parent_no = 1 AND t1.TASK_STATUS = '완료' AND t1.project_no = #{no}

SELECT t1.task_no, t1.task_name, t2.name, t1.enddte, t1.task_priority, t3.PROJECT_NAME FROM pms_member t2, project_task t1, PMS_PROJECT t3 WHERE t1.pno = t2.pno and t1.task_parent_no = 1 AND t1.PROJECT_NO = t3.PROJECT_NO AND t2.pno = #{pno}

SELECT t1.task_no, t1.task_name, t2.name, t1.enddte, t1.task_priority, t3.PROJECT_NAME FROM pms_member t2, project_task t1, PMS_PROJECT t3 WHERE t1.pno = t2.pno and t1.task_parent_no = 1 AND t1.PROJECT_NO = t3.PROJECT_NO AND t2.pno = #{pno} order by t1.enddte
SELECT t1.task_no, t1.task_name, t2.name, t1.enddte, t1.task_priority FROM pms_member t2, project_task t1 WHERE t1.pno = t2.pno and t1.task_parent_no = 1 AND t1.TASK_STATUS = '완료' AND t2.pno = #{pno}

SELECT DISTINCT t1.pno, t1.NAME, t3.project_name, t3.project_content, t3.project_no, (SELECT count(*) FROM PROJECT_TASK a, pms_project b WHERE t1.pno = pno AND a.PROJECT_NO = b.PROJECT_NO) AS task_tot, (SELECT count(*) FROM PROJECT_TASK a, pms_project b where TASK_STATUS = '완료' and t1.pno = pno AND a.PROJECT_NO = b.PROJECT_NO) AS task_done FROM pms_member t1, PROJECT_TASK t2, pms_project t3 , PMS_MEMBER_PROJECT t4 WHERE t3.PROJECT_NO = #{no} AND t4.pno = t1.pno AND t3.PROJECT_NO = t4.PROJECT_NO ORDER BY pno
SELECT DISTINCT pm.pno, pm.name FROM PMS_MEMBER pm, PMS_MEMBER_PROJECT pmp WHERE pmp.project_no = #{no} and pm.pno=pmp.pno
SELECT * FROM PMS_MEMBER pm join PROJECT_TASK pt ON pm.PNO = pt.PNO JOIN PMS_MEMBER_PROJECT pmp ON pm.PNO = pmp.pno
SELECT pno, imgpath FROM PMS_MEMBER WHERE 1=1 And pno like '%'|| #{pno} ||'%'
